attributes.review: I do not like this app worst made app in the App Store!!!!!! It is useless and never work I don’t know why anyone would create such a useless app. I recommend you not even download it, Apple needs to take down this app no point for it and the worst app ever on the App Store!!!!
attributes.title: Useless app

attributes.review: I honestly just think this app is awful. i did not come onto the app store to see some cheeto puff or whatever tf you want to call our president. Really just made me want to grab the bleach i use to clean my bathroom and pour it in my eyes. Worst encounter of my day. -8/10
attributes.title: Absolutely Despise It👁👄👁

attributes.review: If I could rate this app zero stars I would. I downloaded the app trying to find the upcoming rallies, but after I opened it up my dog started throwing up red, white, and blue m&ms. It was a disaster, BUT THAT WASN'T THE ONLY THING! Immediately after, my siblings looked like robots and began to chant “Trump 2020”. All in all I would say DON’T GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: Dog Disaster

attributes.review: Trump is the color of cheese and I LOVE cheese but when trump became president my cheese liking dropped faster that gravity could by 73 percent, so thank you Trump (AKA the orange man), you have made me dislike cheese more that I dislike the fact that your son has no social life.
attributes.title: Try to tell me one good thing about the orange man

attributes.review: It kills everyone you love and throws you off the world. I saw another review that said it saw a ugly Cheeto working out 😳. Very inappropriate also I’m from TikTok this stupid Cheeto wants to👏🏼ban👏🏼the👏🏼app. So even more reason to hate the ugly Cheeto and his app 😌. I hope the App Store deletes this app it was very disturbing 💅.
attributes.title: Piece of trash 💅😌✨

attributes.review: This app is the worst🤢. I was walking my dog one day and my grandma was 2 feet away. She had seen the president n00des🍤 so when she saw that I had the app she got a flashback of the presidents leaked n00ds. She died due to a heart attack rip grandma 👵. Also the president is a rap*st and a pedoph*le and a rac*st but y’all yt people chose the ignore it.
attributes.title: This app killed my grandma

attributes.review: I mean we’re getting rid of Tik tok for stealing information but this app is so much worse! Asked for my email AND my phone number. ALSO asked to see my location! I can’t believe this ! I say we should get it deleted !!
attributes.title: Stole All my information

attributes.review: I CANNOT BELIEVE this app is even allowed in this country! when I opened the app my house immediately burned to the ground from the noises the app emitted from my phone. the noises also caused my dog to start seizing and this app poses a great safety issue. this app needs to be removed immediately.
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review: My dog’s uncle who is a goldfish died because of this app, my goldfish would projectile vomit. The app takes forever to loadddd and I had to wait a very long time. So long that i didn’t feed the goldfish- and when it actually opened my goldfish was dead. Now my dog has to live a life with no uncle. RIP UNCLE RONNY THE GOLDFISH. I DO NOT RECCOMEND THIS APP.
attributes.title: no thanks

attributes.review: As I was putting 😌on my daily coat💅 of orange 🍊spray paint I realized I had not downloaded the Trump 2020 app😦 so I ran out of my bunker 🏃🏻‍♂️ and got my phone 🤳and got it right away💞 but then my phone started levitating and screamed in a demonic voice “TRUMP 🍊2020🍊 TRUMP🍊 2020🍊” it looks like nobody’s safe from the misogynistic, fascist, racist reign of terror of president 🍊.
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨💅😌💞
